1.title: Meet the Mascots
1.plot: Dive into the world of four mascots at very different stages in life: Joel (LOU SEAL), a professional mascot from the MLB's San Francisco Giants; Chad (TUX from Season One), a minor-league mascot front he AHL's Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins; Chris (VARIOUS MASCOTS), an autistic freelance mascot; and Navey (THE TIGER), a female high school mascot for the Gilbert Tigers in Arizona.

2.title: Blood, Sweat and Tears
2.plot: Chad brings cheer to a young boy who recently lost his father. Chris helps recruit donors for a local blood drive. "The Tiger" faces off against a rival high school. "Lou Seal" celebrates the first home game at the Giants' opening day.

3.title: The First Time Is the Hardest
3.plot: Navey competes in her first ever mascot competition. Chad takes "Tux" skiing. Joel has to face his biggest fears repelling down a 15-story building. Chris leads a walk-a-thon at his old school as "Flappy the Eagle."

4.title: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Paddleboard
4.plot: Chad performs at his first ever NBA game. Navey challenges a rival school's mascot to a 50-yard dash. Chris takes his first ever Zumba dance class...in a dragon suit. Joel sends "Lou Seal" out to sea to compete in a paddleboard race.

5.title: Special Delivery
5.plot: Joel's wife Sierra goes into labor during a Giants game. Chad applies for a pro position as the Pittsburgh Pirate. Navey pulls out all the stops at a Tiger's basketball game. Chris tries to bring in business after a doctor's visit.

6.title: In for a Surprise
6.plot: Navey heads to her junior prom. Chris gets a birthday surprise. Chad brings out "Tuxette" and invites last season's"Rooty the Cedar Tree," to play the role. Joel has a big surprise planned for his family at the Giants' Father's Day game.

7.title: Heroes and Villains
7.plot: Chad gets big news as he runs a mascot camp. Navey visits a college and gets a very special tour. Chris goes to a Phillies game and gets to meet his idol. Joel trades in his "Lou Seal" suit for the Giants' legendary anti-mascot.

8.title: With a Little Help
8.plot: Navey seeks redemption at the national mascoting championships. It's Joel's first time watching both kids. Chad receives a big gift and heads on a road trip with his son, Cody. Chris struggles with his anxiety at an important meeting.

9.title: All in the Family
9.plot: Chad and Cody arrive in Florida to thank the family for their gift. Joel tries to get Chloe in the "Baby Seal" suit. Chris visits his therapist to learn new coping strategies for his anxiety. Navey returns to her elementary school.

10.title: The End Game
10.plot: Joel hopes baby Iris brings a World Series victory to the Giants. Navey must begin to say goodbye to "The Tiger." Chris performs in front of thousands of people. Chad rallies fans at a playoff game and reflects on the year.

1.title: Meet the Mascots
1.plot: Dive into the world of four mascots at very different stages of life: "Lou Seal" of the SF Giants, minor-league mascot "Tux," freelance mascot Chris Hall, and "The Tiger" from Gilbert High in Arizona.

2.title: Don't Give Up
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: The Magic of Being a Mascot
3.plot: Kevin corrals three of his kids into a "Bango Family" skit, even though his youngest son is terrified of wearing the mask. Jersey pulls out all the stops for UNLB basketball's season opener. Ditching Tux for his magic act, Chad finds being out of the suit more difficult than he thought. And things get hot for Michael when he takes Rooty (the Cedar Tree) to the homecoming bonfire.

4.title: Just Go for It
4.plot: Kevin goes all out for "90's Night" at the Bucks, featuring a half-time show by Vanilla Ice. Jersey clashes with his boos while rehearsing for a performance with the Rebel Girls dance team. Chad ropes his fiancée Darla into wearing the "Mrs. Tuxette" costume for a big game. Michael (and Rooty) bring their moves to the homecoming dance.

5.title: Expect the Unexpected
5.plot: Kevin frightens unsuspecting fans while wearing an "Inflatable Bango" costume at a local mall. Chad heads to an away game and faces the threat of being in enemy territory. Jersey organizes a mascot basketball game to entertain local students attending the "Rebel Reading Challenge." Michael encounters a surprise guest while supporting the high school bowling team.

6.title: You Have to Lose Sometimes
6.plot: Kevin ups his game in hopes of helping the Buck's end the Miami Heat's 22-game winning streak. Jersey holds auditions to find the next Hey Reb. Chad takes a gig at a local country club to help his chances of winning a mascot competition. Michael channels the holiday spirit by decorating Rooty with Christmas lights, but will it be enough to help the basketball team come from behind for a much-needed victory?

7.title: In It to Win It
7.plot: Kevin turns up the heat during a cooking competition for a local charity. Chad mentors a younger mascot from a nearby team. Jersey faces one misstep after another during a golf tournament in San Diego. Michael agrees to perform in a wrestling stunt to support the team, but he quickly questions his decision after learning that their opponent's mascot used to be a football player.

8.title: Performing Under Pressure
8.plot: Kevin faces an impossible decision when an injury threatens to end his season early. Chad takes Tux to a children's hospital to cheer up patients and doctors alike. Jersey fights through tears when Hey Reb gets honored at his final home basketball game. At Lebanon High School's final home basketball game, Michael attempts his biggest stunt yet: a split.

9.title: Turning Points
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Goodbye, for Now
10.plot: Kevin breaks out a very special guest, Mrs. Bango, as he makes a final decision on the fate of his career. Chad says goodbye to his son Cody and questions his decision to pursue his pro mascot dreams. Jersey revels in his new status as a UNLV graduate - now he just has to figure what's next. Michael marks the end of the school year with a special ribbon-cutting ceremony to honor the new school building and reflects on the past year.

imdb.plot outline: A behind-the-scenes adventure into the colorful and never-before-seen world of sports mascots. Told from four mascots' perspectives: high school, college, minor league , and professional, "Behind the Mask" takes an authentic look at the sports world's most unsung heroes, inside and outside the suit.
imdb.title: Behind the Mask
plot: A docuseries about the colorful, unusual world of sports mascots.::Anonymous
